thread.title: BRIEF-Dunkin' Brands Enteres Accelerated Share Repurchase Agreements

title: BRIEF-Dunkin' Brands Enteres Accelerated Share Repurchase Agreements
text: 38 AM / Updated 16 minutes ago BRIEF-Dunkin' Brands Enteres Accelerated Share Repurchase Agreements Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 15 (Reuters) - Dunkin’ Brands Group Inc: * DUNKIN’ BRANDS GROUP - ON FEB 14 CO ENTERED ACCELERATED SHARE REPURCHASE AGREEMENTS TO REPURCHASE AGGREGATE OF $650 MILLION OF CO‘S COMMON STOCK * DUNKIN' BRANDS SAYS EXPECTS ASR AGREEMENTS TO ADD ABOUT $0.20 TO $0.24 TO PREVIOUSLY ANNOUNCED 2018 GUIDANCE FOR EARNINGS PER SHARE AND ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE - SEC FILING Source text: ( bit.ly/2EvS5ry ) Further company coverage:
